Personal Settings - Web UI¶

The behavior of the Web UI can be influenced by the settings you made in the Web UI tab of the personal settings.

History¶

Maximum Number of Entries within the History¶

The system stores objects that you have recently used. These are prominently displayed in many places, e.g. on the class page. You use this setting to specify how many objects are to remain in the history

Number of Objects within the History per Class¶

This setting determines how many objects of the same class are stored in the history.
